attributes.action: Reinstate the Death Penalty for Treason
attributes.additional_details:
Also, intertwining committed acts of Terrorism and espionage should be classed as Treason against the British people. A new definition of Treason should be published where it ought to cover the British people, and not just social superiors.

For example, if a UK National, even the PM or Royal family member committed an act of treason, they should be tried, with an option of the Death Penalty being deemed appropriate for their punishment.
attributes.background: This is a call for the UK Government to reinstate the Death Penalty as an option for judges when an individual has committed (or attempted to commit) an act of Treason.
